job.title: Long-Term Full Stack Developer [Angular, JS, C#, .NET, Python, Azure]
job.description:
⚠️ Important: Generic, AI-generated cover letters will be automatically rejected. Please provide a concise application letter outlining your specific experience, including links or screenshots of similar projects you have worked on.

I'm looking for a highly skilled and experienced full stack developer to join our team on a long-term basis, with the opportunity for this position to evolve into full-time employment.

Our company has developed a sophisticated web application over the years dedicated to processing of photos and metadata acquired by drones. We constantly require modifications and enhancements to both its frontend and backend.

➡️ About the Application:
Frontend: Developed using the Angular framework, primarily in JavaScript, with HTML and CSS.
Backend: Utilizes the Microsoft .NET framework, programmed in C#.
AI Functionalities: Implemented using Python. (I will provide more information about this component later.)
Deployment: All software is stored and deployed on Microsoft Azure.

➡️ Requirements:
- Demonstrated expertise with Angular and a strong grasp of frontend development (JavaScript, HTML, CSS).
- Solid experience in backend development with the Microsoft .NET framework and C#.
- Proficiency in Microsoft Azure, including deployment, management, and configuration of applications.
- Experience with Python and AI functionalities integration is desirable.
- Ability to work both independently and as part of a team in a dynamic environment.
- Exceptional problem-solving skills and meticulous attention to detail.
- Excellent communication skills with fluency in English.

➡️ Responsibilities:
- Understanding and estimating required changes pipeline.
- Modifying and improving the application's frontend and backend as needed.
- Conducting a thorough review of the existing codebase and identifying improvement opportunities.
- Ensuring seamless integration and deployment of the application on Microsoft Azure.
- Collaborating with the team to incorporate new features and functionalities, maintaining high performance and responsiveness.

➡️ What We Offer:
- The chance for long-term collaboration with the potential for full-time employment.
- An opportunity to contribute to a dynamic and evolving project.
- Competitive compensation, reflective of experience and expertise.

➡️ Application Process:
Please submit a detailed letter of application, emphasizing your experience with Angular, .NET/C#, Microsoft Azure, and, if applicable, Python. Include links or screenshots of projects you have directly contributed to that demonstrate your capabilities in these areas.

We are seeking individuals who exhibit the utmost seriousness and professionalism. This position represents a fantastic opportunity for growth and the possibility of securing a permanent role within our organization.

Looking forward to hear from you!

customFields.generatedDescriptionAI:
We are looking for a skilled and experienced Full Stack Developer to join our team for a project that is expected to last more than 6 months. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in web development, with expertise in Angular, JavaScript, C#, .NET, Python, and Microsoft Azure.

As a Full Stack Developer, you will be responsible for designing and developing web applications using the latest technologies. Your main focus will be on building user-friendly interfaces and integrating backend services. Experience in AI app development and AI development will be a bonus.

To apply for this position, please submit a proposal detailing how you can contribute to the project. We are particularly interested in hearing about your previous experience in web development, including any projects you have completed using the mentioned technologies. Please provide links to your past work that showcase your skills and expertise. We look forward to reviewing your proposals and finding the right candidate for this exciting opportunity.
customFields.inputsTitleAI: Full Stack Developer [Angular, JS, C#, .NET, Python, Azure]
